text: Ulrich "Uli" Bittcher (born 10 September 1957) is a retired German footballer who played as a midfielder. He made 252 appearances in the Bundesliga for Schalke 04 and Borussia Dortmund and played 38 matches in the 2. Bundesliga for Schalke. == References == == External links == * * Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:German footballers Category:Germany B international footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Bundesliga players Category:2. Bundesliga players Category:FC Schalke 04 players Category:Borussia Dortmund players Category:Sportspeople from Gelsenkirchen
title: Ulrich Bittcher
